title: The Shooting gallery
creator_credit: Miroslav Stepanek, Zdenek Bumba, Kratky Film and Sim Productions
brief_description: Mechanical targets in a shooting gallery are the protagonists in this allegory about the repression of freedom and the destruction of love. The film is a springboard for thought and discussion about political, social and interpersonal relationships. Animation by Stana Prochazkova.
